mapper.sql: Id, FileSystem, Size, Used, Avail, UseAge, MountedOn, OperatingTime

update diskinfo
FileSystem = #{filesystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Size = #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Used = #{used,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Avail = #{avail,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
UseAge = #{useage,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
MountedOn = #{mountedon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OperatingTime = #{operatingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
